The Game Theory Shiny Web Application is an interactive platform built with R that allows users to simulate game theory scenarios, learn decision-making strategies, and play interactive games.

frontmatter.title: Stock Price Simulator: Monte Carlo Simulation in R Shiny

node.html: Simulate and forecast potential stock price movements using Monte Carlo simulations with the Stock Price Simulator, a web application built with R Shiny.
